name: capstone-project
description: How to use the application     -   Once the application is open you will see the name of the application, the search bar, and a few tabs     -   Type whatever you want to search into the search bar and then press the button     -   navigate to one of the tabs by clicking on them and you will find all the information you need     -   You are also able to press the save button to save the item you wish to view later and then go to the save tab to find them all     -   You will then be able to delete items in your saved tab as you wish

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=FALSE npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
